attributes.action: Reject, by immediate parliamentary action, the referendum vote to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Government and industry are now largely paralysed and the U.K.appears to be ostracised by many previously friendly governments and financial institutions
attributes.background: The leave campaign made many unsustainable promises about how monetary savings would be made, and on what these would be spent on. They also neglected to prepare any plan for the effects of achieving a majority vote to leave effectively throwing the country into economic chaos.
